title: firsts.
body:
tony is a lot of steve’s firsts. not in that sort of way, although a case could be made, but more in the sense that steve hadn’t been on dates, hadn’t had a proper first kiss, hadn’t done the awkward growing up hand holding, hadn’t had a proper makeout session, hadn’t done practically anything. 

so, tony is a lot of steve’s firsts.

when they hold hands for the first time, tony teases steve about it. “holding hands now, rogers? haven’t done that in a while,” tony jokes, swinging their interlocked hands between them. steve glances down, his ears reddening and tony can feel, genuinely feel the doubt and worry start running through steve’s head.

“hey, no i didn’t mean it like that,” tony says, stopping to pull steve’s head up towards him. “i like it, actually,” he admits, quieter. the air is chilly around them and they’re both in warm coats and scarves and tony’s colder than he’d normally like to admit. steve finally looks up, smiling almost childishly, and admits, softly, “i’ve never really held hands with anyone before” and tony feels something inside him just fucking melt. 

“that is just…adorable,” tony whispers, as he leans in to kiss steve. tony’s cold but steve isn’t, his mouth warm and eager. when they pull away, breathing heavier, steve has snowflakes on his eyelashes and tony’s lips are a rosy red against his skin. 

“we can hold hands whenever you want if it gets you to kiss me like that again,” tony jokes, his hand tightening around steve’s. steve never really tells him how much it means to him, but he thinks tony knows.

tags: that'd make billions of souls to touch but tony would find a way to 'wake them up' all at once 😂
summary: Imagine, so in Avengers 4 Tony finds out somehow the gone are trapped in the soul stone and Nebula's there and she doesn't know...
body: Imagine, so in Avengers 4 Tony finds out somehow the gone are trapped in the soul stone and Nebula’s there and she doesn’t know how to get the soul stone but she knows where Thanos got the soul stone so up to Vormir they go and they meet Red Skull of course and like I’ve read somewhere, Tony decides to sacrifice himself instead of sacrificing someone, but no one wants to kill Tony so he “kills” himself instead, sacrificing himself instead of choosing to sacrifice a loved one and that’s something not Red Skull nor Thanos ever did, and when Red Skull said “in order to take the stone, you must lose that what you love”, it doesn’t mean Tony only loves himself like haters would say, it’d be Tony making the choice to lose Pepper and everyone else he loves, “you must lose that what you love” = “you must die and therefore lose what you love” and everything Tony has. So Tony’d make the Ultimate Sacrifice and in doing so he doesn’t just get the soul stone, he gets inside of the soul stone and becomes the master of the soul stone so basically he can control it whether he has it or not and he can control the souls in there and so when he gets into the soul stone there are all these motionless, similar therefore unrecognizable, vapory figures around him, like The White Walkers when Bran visits them for the first time, and Tony’s like “Wtf?” but he gets it, slowly gets it, so he touches one of the vapory figures and whoever it is slowly comes back to life, to their solid living form aaand I’m going too far it’s late

So Tony’d make the Ultimate Sacrifice and in doing so he doesn’t just get the soul stone, he gets inside of the soul stone and becomes the master of the soul stone so basically he can control it whether he has it or not and he can control the souls in there and so when he gets into the soul stone there are all these motionless, similar therefore unrecognizable, vapory figures around him, like The White Walkers when Bran visits them for the first time, and Tony’s like “Wtf?” but he gets it, slowly gets it, so he touches one of the vapory figures and whoever it is slowly comes back to life, to their solid living form aaand I’m going too far it’s late

tags: the two jackass geniuses played by former sherlock holmes actors
taking potshots at each other and fighting
just kinda chilling and goofing off together
and making fun of their humans
imagine the looks on tony and stephen's faces
but if their best non-biological friends
the two humans will put up with each other
summary: Has anyone made fanart of DUM-E and the Cloak of Levitation meeting each other?
title: Has anyone made fanart of DUM-E and the Cloak of Levitation meeting each other?
body:
I can’t decide whether they would love each other or hate each other, but I’m sure whatever they feel toward each other, it would be very strong.

It would be adorable if they didn’t like each other and always picked on each other.

But it would be hilarious if they did, given their humans don’t seem to like each other very much.

title: Care Less
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2E27kaU

by HarmoniaChimera, theMadStarker

Tony hosts an Avengers party, except he gets grossly drunk and everyone leaves, because they know how much of a shit he can be when he’s like that. Except for Peter.

title: Strange New World
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KF369v

by salmonskinroll

Everyone comes back, eventually, because the good guys always do in the end. But when you’ve died, how do you ever come back from that, really? How do you come home to the people who mourned you and look them in the eye?

It’s supposed to get easier. Peter Parker is still waiting.

Words: 2504, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Peter Parker, May Parker (Spider-Man), James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Bucky Barnes Is a Good Bro, Angst, Coping


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KF369v
